ygData.subject: Re: Lambent Quest Update
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I got a lambent stone off the only hill giant I found all night (I m not kidding!) I also got both runes from the clops brothers in WK.  (Choon and
ygData.messageBody:
"Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)" wrote:
>
> From: "Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)" <Michael.Garramone@...>
>
> called the wife. out of the 3 basalt gargoyles in the spider hall, one
> dropped a basalt carapace her first pull. out of the shin ghoul knights in
> the bedroom, one dropped the shin greaves. i am liking this so far. now
> the bad news. 7 sand giants, 5 Griffins, 3 Hill Giants and NO lambent
> stones. argh. i told her to petition and make sure they are in the game.

I got a lambent stone off the only hill giant I found all night (I'm not
kidding!)

I also got both runes from the clops brothers in WK. (Choon and
Proon(?) with the top of the rune of the one eye and middle of the rune
of the one eye respectively)

Now my question is... how hard are the Solusek Mage and Solusek
Champion?

Any info appreciated.

All the above items are Lore and Nodrop. An interesting if frustrating
thing is that the runes of the one eye are COMPLETELY identical in
appearance and name, but different items.

Jyzan
